channel.title: Youth pregnancy
channel.description: If a 17 (october 3) year old has sex with a 15 (october 29) year old in the state of georgia could the 17 year old be prosecuted, if so for what?

item.title: Youth pregnancy
item.dc:creator: @RDG RDG
item.description:
@RDG wrote:

[quote=“c|p, post:2, topic:423114”][quote]The age of consent in Georgia is 16 and there is no close-in-age exception, though the offenses are significantly reduced in severity if the actor is under 19 years of age and is no more than 4 years older than the victim.

The crime of “statutory rape” makes it illegal for anyone to have sexual intercourse with someone under the age of 16 that they are not married to. This law specifies that a defendant cannot be convicted on the testimony of the victim alone; some other evidence must be present. This offense carries a minimum sentence of 1 year in prison, and a maximum of 20 years. If the offender is 21 years of age or older, the minimum is raised to 10 years in prison, and the offender is subject to sex offender sentencing guidelines. However, if the victim is 14 or 15 years old and the actor is age 18 or younger and within 4 years of the victim’s age, the crime is reduced to a misdemeanor with a maximum sentence of 1 year in prison.[/quote][/quote]

Yeah but in jail people have sex with you whats the difference? lmfao I really dont see the point of that law if the jails break it.

Read full topic

item.title: Youth pregnancy
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“SpeedIsMeh, post:35, topic:423114”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=525765.msg3859573#msg3859573 date=1324591124]
Uh… you must have never read the bible, because there was nothing about age in there. Mary was actually a LOT younger than Joseph.
[/quote]
Young enough for it to be considered statutory rape?[/quote]It’s assumed she was 13, as normally she would have been married whenever she started puberty (~12)

Some people say that should could have been 20 based on the fact that ‘God wouldnt have put such a tough decision on such a young person’, but they have nothing to back that up except past examples, it doesn’t actually say anything like that anywhere.

As for Joseph, he literally could have been ANY age. Some people say he was 90-95 years old, some say he was 20-30

PS ^ - They were unrelated statements, one was replying to RIP RSC saying that there is nothing about the age of consent in there, the other was about the age of the two people in particular.

item.title: Youth pregnancy
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

if he is 17 and actually gets charged and the first time charged for this offense he will be looking at little, sex classes at the least or, at the most, DOC completion or STEP or sex offender classes inside the institution, normally in Indiana STEP (C complex Pendleton Juvenile) takes 9-12 months, as do most programs around the United States. Sex offenders/Sex crimes are usually frowned upon though by peers so, if your in jail for 9-12 months your going to be called a rapist and isolated from anyone else in Protective Custody. I’ve seen it happen, it’s not fun and your gonna wish it never happened.

Read full topic
